title: World-Wide
text:
---

The U.S. has stepped up airstrikes in southern Afghanistan amid growing apprehension over a Taliban offensive threatening Kandahar.

---

Fire crews made progress in containing the nation's largest forest fire in Oregon, as scores of blazes raged in the Pacific Northwest, Rockies and California.

---

Lawmakers pushed to complete an infrastructure deal but were at odds over how much to increase public-transit funding.

---

A Japanese company has started human trials of the first once-a-day pill for Covid-19 patients, joining Pfizer and Merck in the race to find treatments.

---

Heavy monsoon rains in the Indian state of Maharashtra have triggered landslides and flooding that have killed at least 113 people.

---

The Biden administration is considering new sanctions targeting Belarus and its authoritarian leader after a leading dissident appealed for stronger U.S. action.
